BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_PCD_DTL ( STR_EMP_NO,NUM_PCD_NO,NUM_EVENT_ID,STR_EVENT_REASON,DT_EVENT_DATE,STR_ORDER_NO,DT_ORDER_DATE,STR_SIGN_AUTHORITY,STR_AUTHORITY_DESIG,STR_EMPLOYMENT_STATUS,STR_REMARKS,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_PCD_DTL A set A.NUM_EVENT_ID=?,A.STR_EVENT_REASON=?,A.STR_ORDER_NO=?,A.DT_ORDER_DATE=?,A.STR_SIGN_AUTHORITY=?,A.STR_AUTHORITY_DESIG=?,A.STR_EMPLOYMENT_STATUS=?,A.DT_EVENT_DATE=?,A.STR_REMARKS=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=? where A.STR_EMP_NO =? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? and A.NUM_PCD_NO=?
UPDATE PIST_PCD_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.NUM_PCD_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
